item.title: Russian aerial attack hits a Ukrainian hospital, days before Zelenskyy meets Trump
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says Russian forces have launched powerful glide bombs and drones against Kharkiv and hit a hospital

item.title: Asian shares are mixed and US futures little changed after Wall St rally
item.description: Asian shares are mixed after a rally on Wall Street spurred by U.S. President Donald Trump's reassurances over relations with China

item.title: China sanctions 5 US units of South Korean shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean over probe by Washington
item.description: China has banned dealings by Chinese companies with five subsidiaries of South Korean shipbuilder Hanwha Ocean

item.title: Madagascar's president says he fled the country in fear for his life after military rebellion
item.description: Madagascar President Andry Rajoelina says he has fled the country in fear for his life following a military rebellion

item.title: New York Times, AP, Newsmax among news outlets who say they won't sign new Pentagon rules
item.description: The New York Times, The Associated Press and the conservative television network Newsmax are among five outlets on Monday who say they won't sign a ne...
